snippet.title: Man's body found in West Footscray
snippet.content: HOMICIDE squad detectives are investigating the death of a man in Melbourne's inner west tonight. Police were called to Ashley St in West Footscray where a man was discovered suffering from critical injuries just before 7pm. Emergency services attempted to revive the victim but he died at the scene. The exact circumstances surrounding the death are yet to be determined. Anyone with information is urged to contact Crime Stoppers on 1800 333 000 or submit a confidential crime report at
